condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, the capacity of the State and society for the coordinated design and management of equitable and relevant policies for full development in early childhood (0–5 years) in the priority territories will have been built.

description.narrative: ECD policies: “Primero la Infancia” (Childhood First) policy and the design of the RBBP ECD are being implemented with UNICEF technical guidance. This guidance consisted of evidence analysis, methodologies for the implementation of a comprehensive approach to early childhood development, training of ECD service providers, monitoring, and intersectoral coordination. UNICEF led initiatives at local/regional are contributing to improve quality of services, increase budget allocation, improve intersectoral coordination, and serve as a model to design and implement public policies. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of comprehensive early childhood development models, designed and implemented with relevance and quality, which articulate multi-sectoral interventions in priority territories.

actual.value: 2019:3 models started their implementation (1 Lima, 2 Loreto)
